amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to maintain or improve Department of Defense real property with a zero percent utilization rate according to the Department's real property inventory database, except in the case of maintenance of an historic property as required by the National Historic Preservation Act (16 U.S.C. 470 et seq.) or maintenance to prevent a negative environmental impact as required by the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 (42 U.S.C. 4321 et seq.).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to maintain or improve DOD real property with a zero percent untilization rate according to the Department's real property inventory database, except in the case of maintenance of an historic property or maintenance to prevent a negative environmental impact.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
